ai.fallback.financialSituation: I am currently experiencing financial difficulties due to reduced income and increased expenses. My monthly income is insufficient to cover basic necessities such as rent, utilities, and food. I am seeking assistance to help stabilize my financial situation during this challenging period.
ai.fallback.employment: I have recently lost my employment and am actively seeking new job opportunities. The loss of steady income has significantly impacted my ability to meet my financial obligations. I am committed to finding new employment as soon as possible while requesting temporary support during this transition period.
ai.fallback.reasonForApplying: I am applying for financial support to help cover essential living expenses during a period of financial hardship. This assistance will enable me to maintain housing stability and meet basic needs while I work toward improving my financial situation. I am committed to using this support responsibly and am grateful for any assistance provided.
ai.fallback.generic: I am experiencing financial difficulties and respectfully request assistance to help me through this challenging time. Any support provided would be greatly appreciated and used to cover essential living expenses.
ai.usingFallback: AI service unavailable. Showing a template suggestion you can edit.
ai.fallbackNote: Note: This is a template suggestion. Please edit it to reflect your specific situation.
